about_the_game:
Get ready to bounce, squish, and launch your way through a world of fun in "Jeller Fellers"! In this charming but challenging physics-based 3D platformer, you are a wiggly wobbly jelly cube that must navigate through the various environments collecting Jelly beans!

Innovative physics-based Gameplay: Experience a unique control system where every movement, jump, and interaction is influenced by the physics of your jelly cube. Master the art of bouncing and stretching to overcome every obstacle in your path!

Puzzles and Challenges: Solve engaging puzzles and tackle tricky platforming sections. Use your jelly-like abilities to find creative solutions and discover hidden secrets.

Collectibles and Customization: Collect coins and jelly crystals scattered throughout the levels to unlock new skins and accessories for your Jeller. Make your character truly your own!

Charming Visuals: Delight in the vibrant, cartoon-like graphics that bring the world of "Jeller Fellers" to life.

Leaderboards: Compete to achieve the fastest completion time for each level, strive to refine your speed runs, and find the most optimal routes!

Co-Operative Multiplayer: Play with your friends to solve puzzles and complete multiple levels.

Competitive Multiplayer: Play against your friends this squish or be squished in this competitive obstacle course race mode where you compete to complete the courses faster than everyone else while avoiding perilous obstacles.

Join the wobbly fun and embark on a squishy adventure like no other. Will you be able to guide your jelly cube to victory?

Get ready to bounce, squish, and launch your way through a world of fun in "Jeller Fellers"! In this charming but challenging physics-based 3D platformer, you are a wiggly wobbly jelly cube that must navigate through the various environments collecting Jelly beans!

Innovative physics-based Gameplay: Experience a unique control system where every movement, jump, and interaction is influenced by the physics of your jelly cube. Master the art of bouncing and stretching to overcome every obstacle in your path!

Puzzles and Challenges: Solve engaging puzzles and tackle tricky platforming sections. Use your jelly-like abilities to find creative solutions and discover hidden secrets.

Collectibles and Customization: Collect coins and jelly crystals scattered throughout the levels to unlock new skins and accessories for your Jeller. Make your character truly your own!

Charming Visuals: Delight in the vibrant, cartoon-like graphics that bring the world of "Jeller Fellers" to life.

Leaderboards: Compete to achieve the fastest completion time for each level, strive to refine your speed runs, and find the most optimal routes!

Co-Operative Multiplayer: Play with your friends to solve puzzles and complete multiple levels.

Competitive Multiplayer: Play against your friends this squish or be squished in this competitive obstacle course race mode where you compete to complete the courses faster than everyone else while avoiding perilous obstacles.

Join the wobbly fun and embark on a squishy adventure like no other. Will you be able to guide your jelly cube to victory?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 64-bit (Ubuntu 16.04 LTS) (Mint 17.2 Rafaela)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or AMD Radeon RX Vega 64
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a D3D12-capable graphics card Ensure the GPU driver versions are up-to-date: NVIDIA: GeForce Game Ready Driver 391.01 or above AMD: Radeon Software Version 17.30.1031 or above
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux 64-bit (Ubuntu 18.04 LTS) ( Mint 19.3)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K or AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a D3D12-capable graphics card Ensure the GPU driver versions are up-to-date: NVIDIA: GeForce Game Ready Driver 391.01 or above AMD: Radeon Software Version 17.30.1031 or above

name: Jeller Fellers

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

short_description: Bounce, squish, and launch through a vibrant, stylized world in Jeller Fellers, where you *attempt* to control a wobbly jelly cube. Solve puzzles, overcome obstacles, and explore diverse environments in this charming, challenging, physics-based precision platformer
